example.text: This is INSANE! Biden's Border Secretary, Alejandro Mayorkas, must be impeached. Here's the truth: he should have been impeached a LONG time ago. In the meantime, your House Republicans are taking matters into our own hands by voting on the Secure the Border Act this week. [[url]]
Keeping jobs in America is a bipartisan issue! Thank you [[user]] and [[user]] for hosting [[user]] and I to talk international tax. [[url]]
I'm pleased to share that ALL of these principles are included in the Secure the Border Act. This is what a Republican Majority looks like!
Biden’s petulant refusal to negotiate in good faith with a co-equal branch of government is pathetic. [[user]] has our unified support! [[url]]

SECOND: We must STOP aliens from TAKING ADVANTAGE of our asylum process. - GET RID of loopholes that attract aliens who do not have credible claims - We must fix the credible fear standard - We must preserve asylum for genuine asylum seekers not those who abuse the system

RIGHT NOW: Biden and his liberal lackeys are working to deepen our ties with the WHO. Have we forgotten that the US is a sovereign nation? We must NOT continue to surrender authority to the defective WHO. We must withdraw! [[url]]
I'm pleased to share that ALL of these principles are included in the Secure the Border Act. This is what a Republican Majority looks like!
